name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial: Return to the Green Planet
summary: E.T wants to visit his friend Eliot but doesn't have a spacecraft so he builds a spacecraft using what he knows best: botany. He secretly builds a craft using only organic resources found on the Green Planet and converts an oversize turnip into a spaceship that can carry him through space back to Earth. Along the way, E.T. encounters many strange and unusual alien life forms in E.T: RETURN TO GREEN PLANET.
